wikipedia_page.main: Leo Francis Goodstadt,  (Chinese: 顧汝德, 21 April 1938 - 24 April 2020) was a British economist based in Hong Kong. He served as the first head of Central Policy Unit, from 1989 to 1997.

response: *Leo Goodstadt, 82, British-Hong Kong economist, Head of the Central Policy Unit (1989–1997).Professor Leo F. Goodstadt (1938 – 2020)
